segments.text: I notice the boy is stretching as high as he can to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is wobbling dangerously, and he doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, like this is completely normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right under the woman’s nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so distracted by the dishes that she doesn’t even see them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and she’s just standing there, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get into so much trouble if she catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on one foot, and I’m just waiting for him to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before or if this is their first time sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand watching this; someone needs to stop them before they hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR
